languages.text: Губернатор представляет значительную угрозу для безопасности Лорд-капитана и стабильности Януса. Рекомендуется устранение нестабильного элемента.

traits.locale_text: Губернатор представляет значительную угрозу для безопасности Лорда-капитана и стабильности Януса. Рекомендуется устранение нестабильного элемента.

languages.text: The governor poses a significant threat to the Lord Captain's safety and the stability of Janus. The volatile element should be destroyed.
languages.original_text: Губернатор представляет значительную угрозу для безопасности Лорд-капитана и стабильности Януса. Рекомендуется устранение нестабильного элемента.

traits.locale_text: The governor poses a significant threat to the Lord Captain's safety and the stability of Janus. The volatile element should be destroyed.
The governor poses a significant threat to the Lord Captain's safety and the stability of Janus. The volatile element should be destroyed.
The governor poses a significant threat to the Lord Captain's safety and the stability of Janus. The volatile element should be destroyed.
The governor poses a significant threat to the Lord Captain's safety and the stability of Janus. The volatile element should be destroyed.

languages.text: 这颗行星的总督对领主舰长与加努斯的稳定构成了重大威胁，必须消灭掉这个不稳定的因素。
languages.original_text: The governor poses a significant threat to the Lord Captain's safety and the stability of Janus. The volatile element should be destroyed.

traits.locale_text: 这颗行星的总督对领主舰长与加努斯的稳定构成了重大威胁，必须消灭掉这个不稳定的因素。

languages.text: 総督はロード・キャプテンの安全とヤヌスの安定にとって重大な脅威となる。不安定要素は消さなければならない。
languages.original_text: The governor poses a significant threat to the Lord Captain's safety and the stability of Janus. The volatile element should be destroyed.

traits.locale_text: 総督はロード・キャプテンの安全とヤヌスの安定にとって重大な脅威となる。不安定要素は消さなければならない。

languages.text: La gobernadora supone una grave amenaza a la seguridad de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán y a la estabilidad de Janus. Es recomendable eliminar ese elemento volátil.
languages.original_text: The governor poses a significant threat to the Lord Captain's safety and the stability of Janus. The volatile element should be destroyed.

traits.locale_text: La gobernadora supone una grave amenaza a la seguridad de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán y a la estabilidad de Janus. Es recomendable eliminar ese elemento volátil.

languages.text: Die Gouverneurin ist eine signifikante Bedrohung für die Sicherheit des Lord Captains und der Stabilität auf Janus. Das volatile Element sollte beseitigt werden.
languages.original_text: The governor poses a significant threat to the Lord Captain's safety and the stability of Janus. The volatile element should be destroyed.

traits.locale_text: Die Gouverneurin ist eine signifikante Bedrohung für die Sicherheit des Lord Captains und der Stabilität auf Janus. Das volatile Element sollte beseitigt werden.

languages.text: La gouverneure représente une menace considérable pour {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}, ainsi que pour la sécurité et la stabilité de Janus. Cet élément perturbateur doit être supprimé.
languages.original_text: The governor poses a significant threat to the Lord Captain's safety and the stability of Janus. The volatile element should be destroyed.

traits.locale_text: La gouverneure représente une menace considérable pour {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}, ainsi que pour la sécurité et la stabilité de Janus. Cet élément perturbateur doit être supprimé.

languages.text: Vali, Lord Kaptan'ın güvenliği ve Janus'un istikrarı için önemli bir tehdit teşkil ediyor. Bu kararsız etmen yok edilmeli.
languages.original_text: The governor poses a significant threat to the Lord Captain's safety and the stability of Janus. The volatile element should be destroyed.

traits.locale_text: Vali, Lord Kaptan'ın güvenliği ve Janus'un istikrarı için önemli bir tehdit teşkil ediyor. Bu kararsız etmen yok edilmeli.
